TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextEndOfLine extends System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun

Docs.summary: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The text engine client can use the TextEndOfLine class to create a custom linebreak representation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 length) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> buffer.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> class using a specified character length.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 length, class System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties textRunProperties) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> buffer.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> value to use for the characters in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine> buffer.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> class using a specified character length and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties> value.
Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> character buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed int Length { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets the character length of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> character buffer.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Int32"> object that represents the length of the character buffer.

Docs.summary: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"> character buffer.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
